docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

$$ x^2 $$ 测试 [[../../index|名字]]

$$ \frac{\partial u}{\partial x}=\frac{\partial v}{\partial y}\quad\text{和}\quad\frac{\partial v}{\partial x}=-\frac{\partial u}{\partial y} $$ 这是 一次试炼 首先 再写一个公式

$$ \frac{\partial u}{\partial x}=\frac{\partial v}{\partial y}\quad\text{和}\quad\frac{\partial v}{\partial x}=-\frac{\partial u}{\partial y} $$
